resources.string:
Sketch is a powerful and comprehensive picture loader on Android, in addition to the necessary features to load the picture, but also supports GIF, gesture zoom, block display huge image, automatically correct the direction of the picture, display video thumbnails and other functions. 
 
 Features are as follows: 
1. Multiple URL support 
2. Support gif 
3. Support gesture zoom 
4. Support block display huge image 
5. Support level 3 cache 
6. Support correcting picture orientation 
7. Support display APK or APP icon 
8. Support Base64 image 
9. Support various list 
10. Automatically prevents excessive loading Bitmap 
11. Exclusive TransitionDrawable support 
12. Only to load or only to download 
13. Paused download on mobile data 
14. Automatically select the appropriate Bitmap.Config 
15. Powerful and flexible customization

Powered by： 
 1. android-gif-drawable 
 2. PhotoView 
 3. Glide（BitmapPool） 
 4. https://giphy.com 
 5. https://unsplash.com
